org.demoiselle.signer.policy.engine.asn1.etsi

Class SignerAndVerifierRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.demoiselle.signer.policy.engine.asn1.ASN1Object
      • org.demoiselle.signer.policy.engine.asn1.etsi.SignerAndVerifierRules

  • public class SignerAndVerifierRules
extends ASN1Object
    The SignerAndVerifierRules consists of signer rule and verification rules as defined below: 
     SignerAndVerifierRules ::= SEQUENCE {
     signerRules SignerRules,
     verifierRules VerifierRules
 }
    See Also:
    ASN1Sequence, ASN1Primitive
